medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began this morning at 6:30 AM, described as waxing and waning but progressively worsening. There is no association with food intake. The patient denies fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, and changes in bowel movements.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension; Tonsillectomy; Right rotator cuff surgery; Left elbow surgery; Bilateral feet bunion surgery.
medical_history.family_history: Denies family history of gastrointestinal disorders and cancers. Mother had lung cancer and was a smoker. Maternal grandmother had throat cancer.
